ComicInfo.Summary: Bad Apples, Part 1 of 5: At Toni's funeral Tony recalls his wife's funeral. Tony is reinstated to the FDA and investigates a health club where the patrons are self-combusting. Tony and John trace the cause back to a soda company with ties to the egg worshiping cult.
